name: Blubird and the Cursed Canvas
description:
Where am I...?

Once upon a time, there was a boy named Monty. He was blessed with extraordinary powers...

----------------------------------------------

You play as the titular character Blubird, who has stumbled his way into history's terrors once again. Crawling into the canvas his father left in their attic, he ends up inside of the Paint Void.

This game is a sequel to Blubird and the Golden Heart and Blubird and the Memory Machine. Please play those first for the full experience, it isn't required, but there are a few references to both games.. (Pst, you can get it here https://coolblubird.itch.io/blubird-and-the-golden-heart and https://coolblubird.itch.io/blubird-and-the-memory-machine)

----------------------------------------------

This game features:

-six uniquely styled areas to explore, each with their own problems and troubles.

-A whole cast of... uh... how many characters again? (note flipping noises) Well, a lot.

-The charm and humor from the first two games! But with the best style and graphics yet! 

-shout outs to my homies who aren't good at RPGs because this game does not have combat in it.

----------------------------------------------

PLAY THE GAME THAT HAS PEOPLE GOING:

"Wait this isn't Deceased By Sunrise 2" -Eve

"Wait I haven't played it, can I play the game first?" -Kook, last words before I shot him

"I don't feel very threatened with a squirter gun pointed at my head" -Adam

"No." -My Co-Worker

"When are you coming down for dinner? It's been three months." -Dad
